properties.areaDesc: Tulsa, OK; Rogers, OK; Wagoner, OK
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 20 at 3:42 PM CDT until May 20 at 4:15 PM CDT by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
TORNADO EMERGENCY for the City of Tulsa.

At 342 PM CDT, a CONFIRMED LARGE AND EXTREMELY DANGEROUS TORNADO was
located over midtown Tulsa, moving northeast at 35 mph.

THIS IS A TORNADO EMERGENCY FOR TULSA. TAKE COVER NOW!

HAZARD...Deadly tornado.

SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. Radar confirmed tornado
         debris signature.

IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may
         be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes
         will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses,
         and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible.

This tornado will be near...
  Downtown Tulsa around 345 PM CDT.
  Catoosa around 400 PM CDT.
  Claremore around 415 PM CDT.
properties.instruction: To repeat, a LARGE, EXTREMELY DANGEROUS, AND POTENTIALLY DEADLY tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If in a mobile home, a vehicle, or outdoors, move to the closest substantial shelter.
